amendment.description: To fully reinstate the pay-as-you-go requirement through 2010.

action.text: Amendment SA 2650 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2650 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 48. Record Vote Number: 340.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 2650.
Amendment SA 2650 proposed by Senator Feingold. (consideration: CR S13115-13116, S13121-13122, S13126-13127; text: CR S13115) To fully reinstate the pay-as-you-go requirement through 2010.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2650 proposed by Senator Feingold.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 2650 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 48. Record Vote Number: 340.
